Description: Fragment of round rim with two grooves on top and flaring wall of Corinthian pottery plate; exterior: traces of paint on edge and top of rim.
Curator's comments: The sherd belongs to same vessel as British Museum 1924,1201.1227.a, 1924, 1201.1227.e and 1924,1201.1227.d.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GB.267) (phase 3)
